item.text: The Ephraimites assembled and crossed over to Zaphon. They said to Jephthah, “Why did you go and fight with the Ammonites without asking us to go with you? We will burn your house down right over you!”
Jephthah said to them, “My people and I were in a struggle, and the Ammonites were oppressing me greatly. I asked for your help, but you did not deliver me from their power.
When I saw that you were not going to help, I risked my life and advanced against the Ammonites, and the Lord handed them over to me. Why have you come up to fight with me today?”

<st data-num="03316" class="">Jephthah</st> <st data-num="06908" class="">assembled</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> and they <st data-num="03898" class="">fought</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>. The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st> <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the Ephraimites insulted them, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> <st data-num="01568" class="">Gileadites</st> are <st data-num="06412" class="">refugees</st> in <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>, living <st data-num="08432" class="">within</st> <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim’s</st> and <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh’s</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">territory</st>.”<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="01568" class="">Gileadites</st> <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> the <st data-num="04569" class="">fords</st> of the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River<n id="1" /> opposite <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01961 03588">Whenever</st> an <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraimite</st> <st data-num="06412" class="">fugitive</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Let me <st data-num="05674" class="">cross over</st>,” the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st><n id="4" /> him, “Are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> an <st data-num="0673" class="">Ephraimite</st>?” If he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st>,”

then they said to him, “Say ‘Shibboleth!’” If he said, “Sibboleth” (and could not pronounce the word correctly), they grabbed him and executed him right there at the fords of the Jordan. On that day 42,000 Ephraimites fell dead.
Jephthah led Israel for six years; then he died and was buried in his town in Gilead.
After him Ibzan of Bethlehem led Israel.

He <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>. He <st data-num="07971" class="">arranged</st> for <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st> of his <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">to be married</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> his extended family,<n id="1" /> and he <st data-num="0935" class="">arranged</st> for <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">young women</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">to be brought</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> as wives for his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>.<n id="2" /> Ibzan<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08199" class="">led</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>;
then he died and was buried in Bethlehem.
After him Elon the Zebulunite led Israel for 10 years.
Then Elon the Zebulunite died and was buried in Aijalon in the land of Zebulun.
After him Abdon son of Hillel the Pirathonite led Israel.

He <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st> <st data-num="01121 01121">grandsons</st> who <st data-num="07392" class="">rode</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="05895" class="">donkeys</st>. He <st data-num="08199" class="">led</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> for <st data-num="08083" class="">eight</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>.
Then Abdon son of Hillel the Pirathonite died and was buried in Pirathon in the land of Ephraim, in the hill country of the Amalekites.
